title: That mouse
creator_credit: Michael Rubbo, Nicholas Balla and ONF | NFB
brief_description: A white mouse cavorts about the forest, mostly on the back of a bumbling black bear, creating such a stir that other forest creatures (a deer, a tortoise, a hawk and a hound) have to put a stop to it. Children will enjoy the way the animals speak with human voices and act out their parts.
